column4: hi, I installed the "gnome" packet and switched to gdm as login manager, I rebooted and it went fine. I set auto-login to on and now I can't reboot
I'm on ubuntu 11.10. Tried recovery mode, nothing could help
there's a few ways you could fix this, one would be to edit the /etc/init.d/gdm script from a live cd
from that terminal.  sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm  - or sudo aptitude --reinstall purge gdm
